Tokenize

public java.util.ArrayList Tokenize(java.lang.String sentence,
                                    Parser.Parser parser)
Method Tokenize receives the sentence as a String and returns ArrayList of Arraylist, where the acutal word in the column no zero, word type in the column no one and the case marker in the column no. two

doFinalCheckMaRRum

public java.util.ArrayList doFinalCheckMaRRum(java.util.ArrayList al_all_word_detail)
This method is to check if the cnjn is added into al_otherWaitingWords while it occur between two unknow. If it is so, then after heuristic process this method is called to check these cnjn and to remove this from al_otherWaitingWords.
